articles.title: On The 100th Anniversary Of The Tulsa Race Massacre, Here Are 3 Docs To Watch - NPR
articles.description: Monday is the 100th anniversary of one of the worst acts of racial violence in American history. A spate of books and documentaries are marking the moment; we round up three to watch this weekend.
articles.content:
